resetTrackModal.heading:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the reset track confirmation modal
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (main heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user attempts to reset their progress on a track
**Technical Context**: `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "You’re about to reset all your %{trackTitle} progress."
resetTrackModal.pleaseReadCarefully:
**Functional Purpose**: Important notice to read instructions carefully
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (introductory paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Please read this carefully before continuing."
resetTrackModal.irreversible:
**Functional Purpose**: Warning that the action is irreversible
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (warning paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "This is irreversible and will mean you’ll lose everything you’ve done on this track."
resetTrackModal.byResettingThisTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the list of items lost upon resetting a track
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "By resetting this track, you will lose access to:"
resetTrackModal.listItem1:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing loss of submitted solutions
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (list item under 'lose access to')
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "All solutions you have submitted in %{trackTitle}"
resetTrackModal.listItem2:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing loss of received mentoring
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (list item under 'lose access to')
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "All mentoring you have received in %{trackTitle}"
resetTrackModal.listItem3:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing loss of reputation
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (list item under 'lose access to')
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Lose any reputation you have earned for publishing solutions in %{trackTitle}"
resetTrackModal.however:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the list of items unaffected upon resetting a track
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "However:"
resetTrackModal.listItem4:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing unaffected local solutions
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (list item under 'However:')
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Any local versions of solutions stored on your machine will be unaffected"
resetTrackModal.listItem5:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing unaffected earned badges
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (list item under 'However:')
**When Users See This**: When a user opens the reset track modal and reviews the consequences
**Technical Context**: `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "You will keep any badges earned as a result of your work on the %{trackTitle} track"
resetTrackModal.confirmationLabel:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction for the user to confirm the action by typing a specific phrase
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (label for confirmation input field)
**When Users See This**: When a user is prompted to confirm the reset action
**Technical Context**: `confirmation` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "To confirm, write %{confirmation} in the box below:"
resetTrackModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel the reset track operation
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the user decides not to proceed with resetting the track
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Cancel"
resetTrackModal.resetTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm and initiate the track reset operation
**UI Location**: Reset Track Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When the user has entered the correct confirmation phrase and is ready to reset the track
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Reset track"
